results.title: Impact of obstructive and central apneas on ventricular repolarisation: lessons learned from studies in man and pigs.
results.text_hl: These changes in ventricular repolarisation could be inhibited by @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ as well as by RDN and were not influenced by parasympathetic blockade by @CHEMICAL_Atropine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001285 @@@atropine@@@.

citations.NLM: Linz D, Denner A, Illing S, Hohl M, Ukena C, Mahfoud F, Ewen S, Reil JC, Wirth K, Böhm M. Impact of obstructive and central apneas on ventricular repolarisation: lessons learned from studies in man and pigs. Clin Res Cardiol. 2016 Aug;105(8):639-647. PMID: 26809960
